languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс печально улыбается.{/n} "Наверное, за десятилетия в Инквизиции я стал не только плохим собеседником, но и параноиком. Я молчу даже когда мог бы что-то сказать без вреда для тебя или себя. Я бы... хотел..." {n}Он умолкает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс печально улыбается.{/n} "Наверное, за десятилетия в Инквизиции я стал не только плохим собеседником, но и параноиком. Я молчу тогда, когда мог бы что-то сказать без вреда для тебя или себя. Я бы... хотел..." {n}Он умолкает.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix smiles sadly.{/n} "Decades in the Inquisition haven't just made me a poor conversationalist, it seems, but a paranoid one as well. I keep silent even when I could say something without risking harm to you or me. I... just wish..." {n}He trails off.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс печально улыбается.{/n} "Наверное, за десятилетия в Инквизиции я стал не только плохим собеседником, но и параноиком. Я молчу даже когда мог бы что-то сказать без вреда для тебя или себя. Я бы... хотел..." {n}Он умолкает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix smiles sadly.{/n} "Decades in the Inquisition haven't just made me a poor conversationalist, it seems, but a paranoid one as well. I keep silent even when I could say something without risking harm to you or me. I... just wish..." {n}He trails off.{/n}

{n}Heinrix smiles sadly.{/n} "Decades in the Inquisition haven't just made me a poor conversationalist, it seems, but a paranoid one as well. I keep silent even when I could say something without risking harm to you or me. I... just wish..." {n}He trails off.{/n}

{n}Heinrix smiles sadly.{/n} "Decades in the Inquisition haven't just made me a poor conversationalist, it seems, but a paranoid one as well. I keep silent even when I could say something without risking harm to you or me. I... just wish..." {n}He trails off.{/n}

{n}Heinrix smiles sadly.{/n} "Decades in the Inquisition haven't just made me a poor conversationalist, it seems, but a paranoid one as well. I keep silent even when I could say something without risking harm to you or me. I... just wish..." {n}He trails off.{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希露出了悲伤的笑容。{/n}“我在审判庭呆了几十年，不仅变得不善言谈，也变得敏感多疑。即便是我能说些什么的时候，我也会保持沉默，以免对你或对我造成伤害。我……我只希望……”{n}他的声音越来越低。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix smiles sadly.{/n} "Decades in the Inquisition haven't just made me a poor conversationalist, it seems, but a paranoid one as well. I keep silent even when I could say something without risking harm to you or me. I... just wish..." {n}He trails off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希露出了悲伤的笑容。{/n}“我在审判庭呆了几十年，不仅变得不善言谈，也变得敏感多疑。即便是我能说些什么的时候，我也会保持沉默，以免对你或对我造成伤害。我……我只希望……”{n}他的声音越来越低。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix sonríe tristemente.{/n} «Por lo visto, las décadas en la Inquisición no solo han afectado negativamente a mis dotes de interlocutor, sino que también me han ocasionado paranoia. Guardo silencio aun cuando podría decir algo sin que ni usted ni yo suframos. O... Ojalá...». {n}Se detiene.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix smiles sadly.{/n} "Decades in the Inquisition haven't just made me a poor conversationalist, it seems, but a paranoid one as well. I keep silent even when I could say something without risking harm to you or me. I... just wish..." {n}He trails off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix sonríe tristemente.{/n} «Por lo visto, las décadas en la Inquisición no solo han afectado negativamente a mis dotes de interlocutor, sino que también me han ocasionado paranoia. Guardo silencio aun cuando podría decir algo sin que ni usted ni yo suframos. O... Ojalá...». {n}Se detiene.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは悲しげに微笑む。{/n}「何十年も異端審問庁に努めてきたおかげで、俺は会話が下手なだけでなく、被害妄想に陥ってしまったようだ。あなたや俺に危害を加えることなく何か言えるときでさえ、黙り込んでしまっている。俺は…ただ…」{n}ハインリックスの声が小さくなっていく。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix smiles sadly.{/n} "Decades in the Inquisition haven't just made me a poor conversationalist, it seems, but a paranoid one as well. I keep silent even when I could say something without risking harm to you or me. I... just wish..." {n}He trails off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは悲しげに微笑む。{/n}「何十年も異端審問庁に努めてきたおかげで、俺は会話が下手なだけでなく、被害妄想に陥ってしまったようだ。あなたや俺に危害を加えることなく何か言えるときでさえ、黙り込んでしまっている。俺は…ただ…」{n}ハインリックスの声が小さくなっていく。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix sourit tristement.{/n} « Il semblerait que toutes ces décennies passées au service de l'Inquisition m'aient rendu non seulement inapte à tenir une conversation, mais aussi paranoïaque. Je préfère garder le silence même quand mes paroles ne risquent pas de blesser qui que ce soit. Je... voudrais simplement... » {n}Il laisse sa phrase en suspens.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix smiles sadly.{/n} "Decades in the Inquisition haven't just made me a poor conversationalist, it seems, but a paranoid one as well. I keep silent even when I could say something without risking harm to you or me. I... just wish..." {n}He trails off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix sourit tristement.{/n} « Il semblerait que toutes ces décennies passées au service de l'Inquisition m'aient rendu non seulement inapte à tenir une conversation, mais aussi paranoïaque. Je préfère garder le silence même quand mes paroles ne risquent pas de blesser qui que ce soit. Je... voudrais simplement... » {n}Il laisse sa phrase en suspens.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix lächelt traurig.{/n} "Wegen meines jahrzehntelangen Diensts in der Inquisition bin ich kein besonders guter Gesprächspartner, aber anscheinend bin ich dabei auch noch paranoid geworden. Ich schweige, obwohl ich etwas sagen könnte, was weder Euch noch mir Leid verschafft. Ich ... wünschte nur ..." {n}Er bricht ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix smiles sadly.{/n} "Decades in the Inquisition haven't just made me a poor conversationalist, it seems, but a paranoid one as well. I keep silent even when I could say something without risking harm to you or me. I... just wish..." {n}He trails off.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix lächelt traurig.{/n} "Wegen meines jahrzehntelangen Diensts in der Inquisition bin ich kein besonders guter Gesprächspartner, aber anscheinend bin ich dabei auch noch paranoid geworden. Ich schweige, obwohl ich etwas sagen könnte, was weder Euch noch mir Leid verschafft. Ich ... wünschte nur ..." {n}Er bricht ab.{/n}
